column4: Why does apt-get dist-upgrade not work in moving my 7.04 system to 7.10?
For upgrading, see the instructions at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UpgradeNotes
PLEASE DON'T SHOUT! We can read lowercase too.

pastebin is a service to post multiple-lined texts so you don't flood the channel. The Ubuntu pastebin is at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org (make sure you give us the URL for your paste - see also the channel topic)
